scripts.i: npm i && npm i -g @superflycss/cli && npm install -g @jsdevtools/version-bump-prompt && npm install -g npm-check-updates && npm install -g npm-install-peers
scripts.pub: bump patch && npm run update && sfc dist && cd dist && npm publish
scripts.build: sfc c && rm -fr src/main/css/google/ && node src/main/js/index.js && node src/main/js/imports.js && sfc b
